data.title: fix android webview keyback bug after opened a page
data.body:
bug happen when:
1.implement keyback in a scene
2.implement webview in that scene and load a default URL
3.click any link and wait for it to load
4.press key back, the implemented keyback will not be called

data.title: Checkbox has problem with check sign scaling when select and unselect checkbox by touch
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: cocos2d-x-3.15.1
- devices test on: iPhone 7
- developing environments
   - NDK version: not use
   - Xcode version: Version 8.3.3 (8E3004b)
   - VS version: not use
   - browser type and version: not use

Steps to Reproduce:
At firs time in function 
void AbstractCheckButton::frontCrossTextureScaleChangedWithSize()
scale of _frontCrossRenderer sets relatively to _frontCrossRenderer's texture size and content size this node but when I select checkbox by touch in function 
void AbstractCheckButton::onPressStateChangedToNormal()
it scale changed relatively to _backGroundBoxRenderer's texture size. Thus check sign can become unproportional.

1. Create cocos2d::ui::CheckBox and assign unproportional textures to background and cross.
2. Change selection state of checkbox by touching it (not by setSelect() method of CheckBox because in this way it works properly)

data.title: Fix android problem
fixed GLViewImpl::getMonitorSize() for desktop platforms
data.body: When application was created windowed `glfwGetWindowMonitor` may return NULL. So return of `getMonitorSize()` will be ZERO. glfwGetPrimaryMonitor was added on glfw 3.0 so you can use it.

data.title: QuadCommand::reIndex performance degradation.
data.body:
Each create QuadCommand and init, call reIndex((int)quadCount*6);
QuadCommand::reIndex fill always static buffer __indices.
https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/blob/v3/cocos/renderer/CCQuadCommand.cpp

Why is that? It error ?
Need fill it buffer only recreate __indices?

data.title: 热更新重大bug，必现
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.15

热更新不能断点续传，没更新完成的时候断开，下次不但不能断点续传而且不能重新下载，把cocos creator的热更新复制过去替换重新绑定就好了。试过很多次都能正常断点续传。

data.title: Additive blending failed: getBlendFunc return wrong value after a setBlendFunc call
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.15.2 (javascript)
- devices test on: Chrome
   - browser type and version: Chrome 60.0.3112.90 (Official Build) (64-bit)

I've just upgraded my Cocos2D-JS game from 3.12 to 3.15.2, and all additive drawing sprites suddenly failed. Upon some digging, here is my result:

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Create a sprite.
2. SetBlendFunc to "new cc.BlendFunc(gl.SRC_ALPHA, gl.ONE)"
3. GetBlendFunc and console.log it

On 3.12, the value returned correctly:
{src: 770, dst: 1} dst: 1 src: 770 __proto__: Object

But on 3.15.2, the value return is like this:
{src: 770, dst: 1} dst: 771 src: 1 __proto__: Object

![problem](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1404549/29153302-04fa2176-7db7-11e7-9f50-e3881fb5ca85.png)

Although it displayed the new value, when I inspect the object printed by console.log, the value is still the old one.

data.title: Improve the efficiency of loadImage
data.body: Although adding an image multi-times is abnormal, I met this situation in my project. So I think it's better to avoid loading a same image multi-times, that is very slow.

data.title: 使用Console->addCommand 添加远程调试命令，调用命令时偶现的崩溃情况
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.15.1
- devices test on:all platform

Steps to Reproduce:

1. using console->addCommand in project
2. use it

addCommand添加回调时是在Console的socket接收线程中直接回调的（包括导出到lua和js），存在同步问题，应考虑使用performFunctionInCocosThread在主线程中执行（导出到lua和js则是必要的）

data.title: JNI 相关函数存在没有释放引用的情况
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.13.1
- devices test on: 网易MOMO
- developing environments
   - NDK version: r10e

Steps to Reproduce:
Java_org_cocos2dx_lib_Cocos2dxHelper.cpp
conversionEncodingJNI
这个函数调用次数超过512次时程序崩溃，报错提示
E/dalvikvm( 3307): JNI ERROR (app bug): local reference table overflow (max=512)
检查发现newArray没有释放

其他地方也可能存在没有释放的情况，建议加上相关测试。

data.title: [ci skip][AUTO]: updating luabinding & jsbinding & cocos_file.json automatically
Why does the ImageViewReader::setPropsWithFlatBuffers method need to check the existence of the plist file when it doesn't find out the image file in the SpriteFrameCache?
Checking force touch availability on cocos
data.body:
Cocos checks for forceTouchAvailabilty using:

-        if ([[[UIDevice currentDevice] systemVersion] floatValue] >= 9.0f)

Can this be a source of bugs when using forceTouch with cocos?

Isn't the best practice to use:

-        if (self.traitCollection.forceTouchCapability == UIForceTouchCapabilityAvailable)

data.title: Let ScrollView swallow touch events variable.
data.body:
SwallowTouch became true on defaut, and can not be changed by below commit. 
Https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/commit/07051a035725728c07276579d3826ebb9ed43188

I added a method that can change it.
